channel.title: Crazin'Scapin'
channel.description: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/801/78545574.jpg/][IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/6654/78545574.jpg[/img][/URL] [b]____________________________________________________________________[/b] Welcome to [i][b]Crazin'Scapin'[/b][/i] development progress post. :| I am currently solo-coding a project called Crazin'Scapin'. I might get up a team of people, depending on how much i want to give into this. I am using Solitude Source and client. I am trying to customize the whole server, and trying to make it unique to all the servers that are already out there. If you have any ideas of what you would like to see in this release please post it down below. [b]____________________________________________________________________[/b] Green: Done Red: Not Started Blue: Starting on it.(i hate yellow) ___________________________________________________ Kiss emote not working No bats on "bat trick" emote. Text messed up on emotes. Changing all old server text(owners,solitude,other crap.) Adding custom emotes. Adding custom quests. There is no character on the "equip item" screen. Remove summoning, useless in RSPS. Remove music, useless in RSPS, replace with custom interface. Change home. 3 Diffrent xp levels(easy,med.,hard) Remove rock background stuff. No agility limites on obsticals.(pipes, rocks)(need to fix) Invisable NPC's?(yellow on minimap,not there on screen) Right click shop on players does not work. Make portal, with guy next to it saying what it is.Ex: Go here for rock crabs.(portal) Add new area's.(skilling area's,other stuff). Add random events. [b]I will work on this server as much as i can, but currently i am finishing final's and i cannot do it this week. I will post on this as much as i can. Thanks.[/b]

item.title: Crazin'Scapin'
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:14, topic:443962”][quote author=nickog15 link=topic=546651.msg4009296#msg4009296 date=1339001433]
yes i am currently coding this server alone.
What does coding mean: The process of assigning a code to something for the purposes of classification or identification.
I am adding code to the server, and deleting some, correct me if i am wrong but that is coding.
[/quote]
Another way to say that would be giving something a codename, like if I were to call you a retard, that would be me “coding”, or classifying you, according to that definition. What “coding” really is just slang for programming.[/quote]

Read full topic

Changing all old server text(owners,solitude,other crap.)

3 Diffrent xp levels(easy,med.,hard)
Remove rock background stuff.
No agility limites on obsticals.(pipes, rocks)(need to fix)
Invisable NPC’s?(yellow on minimap,not there on screen)

Make portal, with guy next to it saying what it is.Ex: Go here for rock crabs.(portal)

item.title: Crazin'Scapin'
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:


____________________________________________________________________
Welcome to Crazin’Scapin’ development progress post.
I am currently solo-coding a project called Crazin’Scapin’. I might get up a team of people, depending on how much i want to give into this. I am using Solitude Source and client. I am trying to customize the whole server, and trying to make it unique to all the servers that are already out there. If you have any ideas of what you would like to see in this release please post it down below.
____________________________________________________________________
Green: Done
Red: Not Started
Blue: Starting on it.(i hate yellow)

Kiss emote not working
No bats on “bat trick” emote.
Text messed up on emotes.
Changing all old server text(owners,solitude,other crap.)
Adding custom emotes.
Adding custom quests.
There is no character on the “equip item” screen.
Remove summoning, useless in RSPS.
Remove music, useless in RSPS, replace with custom interface.
Change home.
3 Diffrent xp levels(easy,med.,hard)
Remove rock background stuff.
No agility limites on obsticals.(pipes, rocks)(need to fix)
Invisable NPC’s?(yellow on minimap,not there on screen)
Right click shop on players does not work.
Make portal, with guy next to it saying what it is.Ex: Go here for rock crabs.(portal)
Add new area’s.(skilling area’s,other stuff).
Add random events.
I will work on this server as much as i can, but currently i am finishing final’s and i cannot do it this week. I will post on this as much as i can. Thanks.
